title: About me and Roos van Sharon
heroDesc1: I chose the name Roos van Sharon because it encompasses everything; mourning, love and joy.
heroDesc2: It symbolizes beauty, love, but also healing of the soul.
heroDesc3: And that is exactly what I want to express with the flowers.
aboutMeDesc1: My name is Francis van Wieringen
aboutMeDesc2: For many years I have worked in healthcare as an activities coordinator. In my work, I have always found it important to seek connection with the residents. I combined this with creative activities.
aboutMeDesc3: Involvement and creativity: that is what I also want to combine now in making these felt flowers. Flowers for significant happy or sad events in people's lives. In the hope of being able to mean something to you in this way.
closingDesc1: Take your time, feel free to look around this website.
closingDesc2: And don't hesitate to contact me if there is anything you would like to ask or discuss. I'd love to hear from you!
